snippet: If the Knicks had been hoping to upgrade their backcourt for what Kurt Rambis has described as a playoff push, they were unable to find traction in talks with potential trade partners.
abstract: Lackluster New York Knicks, with 23-32 record in first half of season, make no roster changes before trade deadline; only recent addition to squad has been interim coach Kurt Rambis; other NBA trades noted.
lead_paragraph: If the Knicks had been hoping to upgrade their backcourt for what Kurt Rambis has described as a playoff push, they were unable to find traction in talks with potential trade partners.

headline.main: Knicks Look Within as the Trade Deadline Comes and Goes
headline.print_headline: Knicks Look Within as the Trade Deadline Comes and Goes
